abstract: Google’s blockbuster growth continued, but investors were apparently hoping for even better fourth-quarter results.
snippet: Google’s blockbuster growth continued, but investors were apparently hoping for even better fourth-quarter results.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 31 — Continuing its blockbuster growth, Google this afternoon reported a sharp rise in both sales and profits in the fourth quarter.

headline.main: Google Posts Sharp Rise in Sales and Profits
headline.print_headline: Google Post Sharp Rise in Sales and Profits
